title: A 13-month old child injured in shooting
content:
WICHITA, Kan. (KWCH) A 13-month-old boy and 20-year-old man were both shot overnight in Wichita.
Sergeant Brian Goward with the Wichita Police Department say both injured have non life-threatening injuries.
The victims were inside a vehicle when someone from outside started shooting according to police. Goward says the shots came from outside the vehicle, but most likely not from someone driving by.
The shooting happened near the intersection of Harry and Volutsia.
The child's mother took him to a nearby Quik Trip to get help. The man was able to get himself to the hospital.
No arrests have been made. Goward says they are still trying to talk to the victims to figure out what happened.
